title.rendered: What is the SEO Agency Pricing Per Month in India?

content.rendered:
With ongoing digital transformation disruption, more companies are coming online to grow their business and acquire new customers. Digital marketing is booming across multiple industries and the demand for SEO services is surging very fast.

Regardless of the business size, companies are looking for reliable ways to gain more traction and drive more revenue. SEO is the best way to boost the business while building a strong online presence. However, many business owners feel overwhelmed while picking the SEO agency pricing for their business.

To clear the confusion, we will check out what is the SEO pricing for SEO. Whether you are a startup or a small-sized company, this brief guide will help you. First, you need to understand how companies decide the SEO pricing because no two websites are the same.

Table of Contents

Toggle
  • Factors deciding SEO Agency Pricing in India:
    • Keywords
    • Current SEO status
    • How fast you want to rank
  • Cost of SEO per month in India
  • Tips to choose the right SEO company

Factors deciding SEO Agency Pricing in India:

SEO is broad and companies focus on the main aspects that bring results to your website. Below are the fundamental factors that decide SEO printings:

Keywords

How many keywords you want to target and what the competition for those keywords will decide the SEO time and cost. It will take more time to rank a highly competitive keyword than the long-tail keywords and it will extend the SEO duration and cost.

Current SEO status

If you have just launched the website, then it would certainly take more time to boost visibility as the domain authority is low. So, to rank multiple keywords, it would easily take at least six months to start ranking. Contrary, if a website’s DA is high and the domain is also older, then it would take less time to rank the keywords.

How fast you want to rank

How fast you need your website to rank on certain keywords will also impact the SEO agency pricing in India. It is because, to rank a domain faster for keywords, SEO executives need to perform more frequent activities to outperform the competitors. Now, let’s jump to the main section.

Cost of SEO per month in India

Most of the professional companies will charge anywhere between $200 to $1300 per month. You can pick a suitable SEO package depending on your requirements. Whichever package you choose, it will cover all necessary aspects of search optimization. If you upgrade the package, it will increase the number of keywords, backlinks, content creation, and more.

Before you pick an SEO package in India, it’s better to have word with the SEO company to discuss your requirements and then buy the right package. You will easily find professional services within this range that will help you boost your company’s online visibility and organic traffic.

Tips to choose the right SEO company

As you know SEO pricing per month in India, it’s equally important to hire the right SEO Company in India that can deliver you results with confidence. Below are some quick points that you should consider while hiring the company:

  • Always ask for their portfolio so that you can check how effective their services are.
  • Before hiring a company, you should be very clear about the business goals that you want to achieve with SEO.
  • Ask the SEO firm to showcase SEO case studies that are relevant to your business. For example, if you are in the automotive industry, then hotel SEO samples are not relevant to you.
  • Before you sign the contract, always read it carefully and check if there are any hidden charges associated with the package.

It’s the right time to opt for SEO services from a professional company and start building more authority online. SEO is a gradual process and it delivers long-term results, so it’s vital to hire an experienced SEO company in India.
